The #FEEDDact increases the use of cover crops on prevent plant acres to prevent soil erosion and enhance soil health. It would secure the overall farm safety net for diversified crop and livestock producers.

The #FEEDDact would provide emergency forage for personal use or donation for family farmers and ranchers when devastating weather hits. https://dustyjohnson.house.gov/media/press-releases/johnson-craig-introduce-bill-address-forage-shortages-disaster-years¬†‚Ä¶

The #FEEDDact would create an emergency waiver authority for @USDA to allow for grazing or harvest of a cover crop before November 1st in the event of a feed shortage due to excessive moisture, flood or drought without producers taking a further discount on their crop insurance.

Today with @RepAngieCraig I introduced the #FEEDDact, which will provide farmers and ranchers additional emergency flexibility to help alleviate feed shortages during planting seasons with high levels of prevent plant due to extreme moisture or drought.  http://dustyjohnson.house.gov/media/press-releases/johnson-craig-introduce-bill-address-forage-shortages-disaster-years¬†‚Ä¶
